creator: Christoph.Pollmann@web.de
text:
MarkerShapePainter.getPaintedArea() returns not the outline of the shape, but
the rectangle, including all defined marker elements.
To correct the behavior change the line
return markerGroup.getBounds();
into
return markerGroup.getOutline();
in the above mentioned method.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: Your recommended fix will be committed soon.
